ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 42
ygData.msgSnippet: Any news on exactly what they do or their stats now that they are really here? ____________________________________________________________________________ ___
ygData.messageBody:
Any news on exactly what they do or their stats now that
they are really here?


____________________________________________________________________________
___

____________________________________________________________________________
___

Message: 2
Date: Tue, 3 Aug 1999 13:00:11 -0500
From: "Nick Bock" <nickbock@...>
Subject: Telescope and Collapsable Fishing Pole

Hiya guys,

Well, I have good news and bad news. The good news is the
Telescope Lens and Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made. And, you DO have
to use a collapsable fishing pole to make the telescope. Both of these
items are makeable.

Now for the bad news. The only person I know that can make
them WILL NOT share the recipe! Can you believe that? He is a gnome on
Xegony by the name of Salvadori, so if you can pry the recipe from him, good
luck. I tried. Well, also, he said that Tinkering skill improvement had
been fixed, and he was up in the 60's on skill. So keep tinkering.

Xalastile
Level 22 Magician
Xegony
